BackstoryDef.title: completely ordinary human
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born a completely normal human and was certainly not three sentient raccoons in a highly elaborate disguise.

BackstoryDef.title: imperial heir
BackstoryDef.description: The heir to a vast empire, [PAWN_nameDef] nearly caused a succession crisis when [PAWN_pronoun] disappeared for almost a year, as did a number of sentience catalysts. When [PAWN_pronoun] returned, those closest to [PAWN_objective] were certain something was different, but they couldn't quite put their finger on it.

BackstoryDef.title: ordinary human
BackstoryDef.description: The former [PAWN_nameDef] made many friends on [PAWN_possessive] sojourn. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to stay and live in the wilderness, while [PAWN_possessive] three friends took [PAWN_possessive] place as [PAWN_nameDef].

BackstoryDef.title: cube obsessed miner
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had a particular talent for mining and crafting, but always in a distinctively blocky fashion.

BackstoryDef.title: limitless human
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has shattered the normal limits of human strength and durability through an impossibly difficult daily training regimen of 100 push-ups, 100 sit-ups, 100 squats, and a 10 km run.

BackstoryDef.title: cultist of Horax
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a cultist and a researcher, part of the team that worked on decoding the most ancient texts of the true faith. The first fragement read: "And as Horax began to believe that he was all alone, he heard her voice. The voice of <color=#86CECB>She of the Cyan Hair</color>."

BackstoryDef.title: cultist of Horax
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a cultist and a researcher, part of the team that worked on decoding the most ancient texts of the true faith. The second fragement read: "As he searched among those like himself for <color=#86CECB>She of the Cyan Hair</color> and her sacred voice, he found only silence. Finally, he received a lead: to find the first sound of the future."

BackstoryDef.title: cultist of Horax
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a cultist and a researcher, part of the team that worked on decoding the most ancient texts of the true faith. The third fragement read: "And when he discovered the truth, that <color=#86CECB>She of the Cyan Hair</color> was nothing more than an ancient vocaloid program, the great Horax was driven mad with indignation for the deception."
